issues_without_maintainer_response.title: Additional tools should be able to be supplied to sampling calls

Streaming sampling results
Allow MCP servers to "resume state"
Make the MCP Protocol support MCP <-> MCP communication, allow AI to chain MCP execution flows
Message bus support
API Defined and/or Client-Defined Session IDs

At the MCP Client side to selectivelly disable some of the tools from being listed
Tools filtering
one JSON-RPC Batch request with SSE stream
[Specification] Make tools inputSchema optional

Provide HTTP REST varient of the protocol

spec defines improper error codes
Ambiguity in error handling documentation for tools

spec should define a unique ID for resource templates

feat: support advanced token target audience validation in addition to RFC8707

Add Claude Desktop and Claude Code representatives to client maintainers group
